html: Anyone who ever said “this is the most important election” in years past, was wrong. Unfortunately, elections cost a lot of money, but if we don’t win this one, it will be the last one you’ll recognize, and I already don’t recognize a lot of my country. It's now or never. #Resistpic.twitter.com/xsgpDmOSFd

html: It's official. With polls closed in KS, MI, MO, we've broken the record for women major party nominees for U.S. House in any year. The previous record was 167. With 5 women candidates unopposed and one all-female primary, we've hit 168 tonight with possibly more to come.pic.twitter.com/KGwEm18AIq
text:
It's official. With polls closed in KS, MI, MO, we've broken the record for women major party nominees for U.S. House in any year.  

The previous record was 167. With 5 women candidates unopposed and one all-female primary, we've hit 168 tonight with possibly more to come.pic.twitter.com/KGwEm18AIq
